name: Commons Network
goal: Commons Network promotes access to knowledge and other social and ecological causes from the perspective of the commons. We engage in policy formulation as well as public debate, promoting the common good through commons-based solutions. We cooperate with civic initiatives, translating ideas and concerns into broader policy initiatives.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Development, Education, Energy, Environment, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020,  Copyright Reform,  Development and relations with UN agencies, Renewable Energy,  Citizens Initiatives, Transparency, Participation and Accountability.
